bibdata.title: IEEE Standard for Insulation Coordination
Definitions, Principles, and Rules
IEEE Standard for Insulation Coordination - Definitions, Principles, and Rules

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: In this IEEE standard the procedure for selection of the withstand voltages for equipment phase-to-ground and phase-to-phase insulation systems is specified. A list of standard insulation levels, based on the voltage stress to which the equipment is being exposed, is also identified. This standard applies to three-phase AC systems above 1 kV.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
